resources.string: A great warrior hailing from the mountains.
May spend extra action points while attacking to add +1 dice for each point used.
If 2 or more enemies are defeated in a location after attacking, remove 1 adjacent minion from every location.
If ending turn at a Neutral or Black location, get one extra hero card.
When starting a turn in a Red location, get one extra action that turn.
Take one less wound when damage is taken.
May spend an action to travel on horseback.
If ending a turn in a location with undead minions, do not suffer fear.
Take one less wound when damage is taken.
Some bloke who crapped in a wood
Add +1 to attack in green locations.
When starting a turn in a Green location, get one extra action that turn.
Does not suffer life token loss when in a location with enemy minions at the end of a turn.
When doing rumors action, get 5 hero cards rather than 3.
At the start of your turn you may choose a team, you do not get wounded when ending you turn on a location with minions of that team.
If you attack a team that you are transformed into gain +2 to dice rolls.
Gain 1 extra die for Quest rolls and healing of tainted land.
Discard a hero card to damage all minions at your location, roll a dice for every minion, a roll of 2 or more is a hit.
May teleport anywhere on the map for 1 action point.
When starting a turn in a Green location, get one extra action that turn.
